places_with_reviews.name: Premdan Hotel
address: 4P9H+8V6, Savedi Rd, Near Premdan Chowk, Savedi, Ahmednagar, Maharashtra 414003, India

reviews.text: It's a famous landmark in ahmednagar almost all good places are near this location ,even a person new to this city ,in two days time knows minimum two location one is Delhi gate and next us sweethome or premdan chowk

A fine and safe to stay hotel,with family.
Good staff and hospitality.
I enjoyed my stay at Preman

Hotel was Good, But not  up to date.
Avarage hotel and Ambiance.

there is electricity everywhere but not in this property around 3-5 am, and no way to contact to reception desk, no one response to you once payment is done, bad experience, rood side and no sound proof windows car noise all night

We booked one room for a group of 6 people. Two bedrooms each with 3 beds made up of iron frame with sharp edges and half foot space between the beds. The wardrobe was pathetic. Far away from the station.

places_with_reviews.name: Iris Premiere
address: 3PJM+F5M, Kothi - Yash Palace Rd, Opp Anand Rishiji Hospital, Maniknagar, Ahmednagar, Maharashtra 414001, India

reviews.text:
Very Bad experience,
Providing an initial review within the first hour of check-in. Will update post-checkout after experiencing the stay.

Check-in process delayed.
Room size extremely compact.
Telephone non-functional, hindering communication with reception or room service.
Hotel conveniently located near the station (within 2 km), but lacks pick-up and drop-off services.
Lack of metered autos raises concerns about potential overcharging.

Would not recommend staying here. Thank you.
I stayed here with my family. It is a nice hotel with clean and well maintained rooms. Food in their restaurant is excellent and their complementary breakfast is very good. We had a great time here.

This is a superb hotel to stay in Ahmednagar. The rooms and bathrooms are clean and spacious. The restaurant is worth checking out and the pizza and paneer dishes were really good. Staff is friendly and courteous. The location is central and there is enough parking. I went there on a family trip to visit Meher Baba's ashram and it was about 5 km from this hotel in downtown Ahmednagar. For those who have not been to Ahmednagar recently, it is growing really nicely without giving up its comfortable small town laid back feel.

The hotel was clean, stylish, and roomy. The food was good and the service was attentive and efficient. The room was comfortable and well equipped.
The hotel had 24/7 room service, easy parking, and lovely staff

The worst !! Please dont go.
Almost all the washrooms are clogged in this so called 5 star property. I still remember we had a wedding to attend next day and the room service guy was fixing the flush at 1am. Plus they directly go into your room for cleaning without informing you even if DND mode is active. PATHETIC HOTEL !!!

places_with_reviews.name: SANJOG LAWNS
address: cottage corner, Don Bosco Area, Ahmednagar, Maharashtra 414003, India

reviews.text:
Suitable Place for Organising events like Birthday's Parties, Anniversary's, Marraige Function with a min. Croud of 100 to Max 1000 pepoles.
Along with it also provides a Decent quality of Food. Great Ambilence. Quality of service needs to be improved. Overall 7 on 10.

Food quality varieties of food nice
Parking areas are good
Location is also good on the
Highway .
Very important any time we will enjoy parties along with family members
Good food prompt service everything clean, drink bar,ok
One of the best places to dine and for conducting large functions. Food is great and staff is courteous
Awesome venue for Grand party. Delicious food options. Great Hospitality people. Above expectations experience

There is something about this hotel
Its old yet grand
Grand sized rooms makes it comfortable and luxurious to stay. Clean bed sheets huge window nice curtains  with sheer for the light to peep in.
Good breakfast spread
Located well withing the city Nagar.
Staff well mannered trained cooperative .
Ample parking space.
Well within budget for the size of rooms and lobby.
Its a feel good hotel.

A very basic hotel with not so clean rooms. The staff is a bit arrogant. If you order something in the room make sure you are ready with the money to pay them immediately. They do not wait to clear the bill and sit on your head until you clear the same. The staff directly gets into your room if you order something. Overall I didn't have a very good experience.
This is a good hotel to stay for official visits, rooms are clean and very spacious . Staff is highly friendly. Very good part is food , tasty and well made. Breakfast is only not so good part..

Friendly staff, excellent service, extremely clean, great ambiance and luxurious rooms.
The hospitality deserves appreciation.
Good Hotel rooms with bathtub, TV, Wi-Fi and others A1 service with budget main things is Hotel is near the market and Station so it’s very helpful for tourists

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Paradise
address: 3PMJ+582, New Tilak Rd, near Sarkar Chowk, Maliwada, Ahmednagar, Maharashtra 414001, India

reviews.text:
Excellent Location. Very near to Ahmednagar Bus Stop (within a Km ). Though the area wad busy and noisy, Hotel is situated inside. So no disturbance at all.
Rooms are Nice. AC, Geyser, TV etc were working nicely. Complementary Water Bottles were provided.
Bed and Linen provided were good. Toiletries were provided. Restaurant was very good.
We have enjoyed our Stay here.

The hotel staff is pathetic, when we ask for water they will give you tap filled open sealed bottle, the hotel has only one iron press and they will call you every 5 mins to return it as apparently the hotel doesnt keep extra iron press.

I needed glue stick and they were so hesitant to give it and said the manager has said not to give simple glue sticks to the customers.

The rooms are okay but the hotel services are terrible

Would not recommend 👎👎

The new rooms are specious and well designed, few small things are taken care of to make a luxurious experience for guests..like cleanliness, hand towel in bathroom etc. Good variety in buffet breakfast. No proper space for driver stay.
Good staff, Good service, food Quality and taste is also good.
This is very good hotel as far as location is concerned all the things are awesome and the Paisa starts from 1500 . For more details you must login to my YouTube channel y

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Radiance
address: Station Rd, near Swastik Chowk, Maniknagar, Ahmednagar, Maharashtra 414001, India

reviews.text: We had dinner at a party and the food was simply not worth eating . Their mix veg was in liquid which means you can't even eat and paneer veg had a few tiny pieces not more than two or three in a full of service Donga . It's really a waste of money. But starters and soups were good.

Property is newly built hence it looks good. However hospitality can be improved. The kind of toiletries provided were minimal. The room service was sub-par. They took a lot of time to serve the tea and sandwiches. The sandwich served were cold
No parking ,rooms are ok but bedsheet blanket towel are old and worst
Rooms are excellent,  service needs to be improved

Overall hotel stay is good experience with the room services and hygienic aspects. The owners were taking keen interest in cleaning with utmost care. They really need to work their food quality, it is too poor and doesn't reflect the standards as per the stay quality, as time will pass merely because of food quality they might lose their potential future business.

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL GULMOHAR PRIDE
address: plot no 231, Gulmohar Rd, near aurangabad highway, Urban Bank Colony, Savedi, Ahmednagar, Maharashtra 414003, India

reviews.text:
Worst hotel for stay. Rooms full of pests .
Staff doesnt care when informed that pests in my room.
Need medical attention when you go to this hotel
The breakfast was promised at 7-7:30am but it was delayed and got our order at 8:15am. The delay has cost me dearly in the subsequent plans. No service ethics.
Such a best hotel to stay in Ahmednagar City.clean and hygienic rooms and bathroom. Humble staff as well owner.very reasonable prices.
Overall a good experience only, but due to laundry towels and other bedding are in pretty bad condition.
Bathroom was too bad  and service was  too slow and worst  and the food was also very bad

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Nishant Zopadi
address: Hotel Nishant Zopadi, Savedi Rd, Mahavir Nagar, Ahmednagar, Maharashtra 414003, India

reviews.text: Very poor service and worst experience, ordered veg thali found hair in it, while complaining to the owner he took it casually, curd milk - taak was too salty, only ambiance good not recommended this hotel
Good lunch but not taste as like

The service is quite slow and the place has also been changed so for new business.
Quality is like old one same no taste but ok ok not a parking structure still it can be done better
And should check out menu card in English
I have ordered butterscotch milk shake but it is not upto the mark as I have paid for it

WORST HOTEL , BAD QUALITY FOOD NO CLEANLINESS. THERE ARE COCKROACHES IN FOOD.I ORDERED SABUDANA KHICHADI THERE WAS COCKROACH IN FOOD.
WORST FOOD EXPERIENCE, FOUND WHOLE COCKROACH IN FOOD.
DO NOT EVER ORDER FOOD FROM HERE KITCHEN MUST BE INFECTED WITH COCKROACHES.
NOT CAPABLE OF RATING 1 ALSO😡😡😡😡

places_with_reviews.name: Capital O V Star
address: Bus Stand, Savedi Rd, Near, Tarakpur, Ahmednagar, Maharashtra 414001, India

reviews.text: Good atmosphere and a unique place for small functions like engagement or similar functions of two to three hours. The service is good. The food quality is required to be improved as the owners are in the hotel industry since last so many years.

These people are good and cooperative.
I booked a suite got room service well mannered.
On morning time they didn't informed about the complementary breakfast.
Worst thing I had ever experienced.
Excellent hospitality. Decent rooms and wonderful food. Friendly crew. VFM. Hotel is dog friendly and was kind enough to accommodate my large dog. Felt at home👍
Nice hotel. Some minor things were not working and those were small irritants. Breakfast is vegetarian and ok. Staff very friendly.

A luxurious yet affordable property situated in a perfect place for people travelling pune or Aurangabad offering wide variety of food ( veg and non veg ) cooked in high quality ingredients. Staff is good for both dine in and room service. Rooms are clean and spacious.

places_with_reviews.name: Vanrai Village Resort
address: MIDC-Shendi bypass, near Datta mandir, Vilad Ghat, Wadgaon Gupta, Pimpalgaon Malvi, Maharashtra 414111, India

reviews.text: Very nice place for friends and family get together also.... All services are very nice.... Waterpark, rides, rooms, food, lawn and all over premises are very good .... Surely visit the place with blind eye....
Had a very wonderful experience with all friends at Vanrai. A must visit place for all family and friends Get together. The food was awesome and the aura and atmosphere is beautiful.Had a blast.
Very very good experience. Water park is amazing. Delicious food. Juices and icecream very good. Staff service is very good. Location is very best and safe for ladies. Rooms are cleaned.

The best resort in Ahmednagar !
We celebrated my parents 25th anniversary here . Mr Mhaske the owner , was professional , punctual and made extra efforts so that our event was perfect . The food , ambience and specially the water park was praised by our guests .The contacts suggested by him for decoration , photographer, projector were professional and did their job exceptionally well .
We the organisers are grateful for his support throughout and looking forward for hosting another programme here .
We have arranged a get together of whole day for 70 people, they have given excellent veg and non veg food and whole day service to us
